# ADH Results

- [GT's data](https://tsoleary.github.io/projects/ADH/scripts/adh_data.html)

- [TSO trial day one](https://tsoleary.github.io/projects/ADH/scripts/adh-s_trial.html)
  - ADH-slow at 18.5°C.

- [TSO data](https://tsoleary.github.io/projects/ADH/scripts/adh_data_tso.html)
  - ADH-fast & ADH-slow at 18.5°C and 23.5°C.

- [TSO data double enzyme concentration](https://tsoleary.github.io/projects/ADH/scripts/adh_trial_061720.html)
  - Double the number of flies to 160 to try to increase reaction velocities overall. 

- [TSO fractionation](https://tsoleary.github.io/projects/ADH/scripts/adh_tso_frac.html)
  - 240 flies homogenized in 3 mL followed by ammonium sulfate fractionation and reconstition of pellet in 1 mL.
    - ADH-fast & ADH-slow were reconsituted in 1 mL and then desalted
    - VT-8, VT-10, & Chiapas were reconsituted in ~ 260 uL, desalted, then brought to 1 mL
